title: THE HATE IS REAL
body:
why should i get harassed by the whole team and fight for them???????????
 least when i fuck up i admit it but why do they need to be dicks about it???
so should i blame myself for the team making a enemy out of me????
and if i lose the will to play thanks to the teams slander why should i be blamed!!!!im playing with assholes
WHY SHOULD I PLAY FOR THIS TEAM???
thats what i say when a people are dicks and what to be dicks for no reason
MOST DONT EVEN SAY ANYTHING OR CAN COME UP WITH A REASON 
IM STARTING TO HATE YOU LEAGUE 


DONT BLAME ME FOR AFK WHEN THE TEAMS BEING DICKS AND HARASSING ME, MAKING ME LOSE THE WILL TO PLAY..YOU TELL ME WHY I SHOULD FIGHT FOR THEM OR EVEN TRY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
